DOC.brief_summary: This complete study evaluate safety efficacy two dose level NX-1207 treatment BPH ( benign prostatic hyperplasia ) versus finasteride .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 2 Study NX-1207 Treatment Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia ( BPH ) ( Enlarged Prostate )
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects randomize NX-1207 blind dose level NX-1207 receive .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Documented history BPH least 1 year 2 . AUA SI ≥ 15 3 . Prostate Volume ≥ 30 mL ≤ 70 mL 4 . Qmax < 15 mL/sec 1 . History illness condition may interfere study endanger subject 2 . Use prescribed medication may interfere study endanger subject 3 . Presence median lobe prostate 4 . Surgery MIST previous 12 month treatment BPH 5 . Postvoid residual urine volume > 350 mL 6 . PSA ≥ 10 ng/mL ; prostate cancer must rule PSA ≥ 4 ng/mL
